subject: Re: Thanks for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to lend money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
$243,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://doubleransalt.com/
